entry.title: Node Js Hackday
entry.content:
Come hack on projects using node.js at Rackspace’s new San Francisco office.

29. February, 2012
  • 9am: Start Hacking
  • 6pm: Start Demos
  • 8pm: Move to a local bar

Hack all day, or come watch the demos and hang out with us afterwards.

Food, beer and skeeball provided. Bring ideas or find a team.

See you there!

  • Rackspace San Francisco
  • 620 Folsom Street
  • Suite 100 (Ground Floor)

Ideas:

  • Developer stats site; turn this into a game a la Twisted Highscores
  • IRC Bots that integrate with build, deployment, tracking tools
  • REST interfaces for language-specific libraries

Useful tools:

  • nodejs
  • async
  • express
  • jade
  • bootstrap

Cross Posts:

  • Eventbrite
  • Meetup | Bay Area Software Engineers

entry.title: Twisted Python Hackday
entry.content:
Successful first public Rackspace SF Hackday! Around 35 hackers showed up and created some sweet demos, listed here.

Come hack on Twisted and Twisted projects at Rackspace’s new San Francisco office. Bring ideas or find a team. This Hackday will feature Jean-Paul Calderone @jpcalderone from Twisted Matrix Labs

Doors open at 9:00am, demos at 9pm. Hack all day, or come hang out (7pm) and watch demos (9pm). Food, beer and skeeball provided. See you there!

Rackspace San Francisco 620 Folsom Street Suite 100 (Ground Floor)

Some ideas:

  • IRC bots
  • REST interface for a python library (to make it accessible to other languages)
  • libuv reactor
  • find blocking code better, eg monkey patch sql calls in twisted
  • fix the bug so that the glade reactor gui is back “twistd –reactor debug-gui -n web”

Cross posts:

  • Eventbrite
  • Meetup | Bay Area Software Engineers
